message: I came across so much comparisons among Satchmo, LFS, Satchless etc, but wondering if anybody has some practical comments about the topic
I too would like a recommendation on this.  All look like good projects, but would love to hear the dirt on each.
Anything but Satchmo. Satchmo has bad, bad security examples.

Django-oscar (https://github.com/tangentlabs/django-oscar) is another option (I'm the author) although I would say it's not mature enough right now for widespread consumption. By early next year though, it should be a good option.

@seanbrant https://bitbucket.org/chris1610/satchmo/src/31148bc4dda2/satchmo/apps/payment/models.py Which includes an 'encrypted' CC field and decrypt methods. Sure, you are 'supposed' to plug in something better, but one careless developer makes this a disaster waiting to happen.
